title: Hi I'm Charles
description: I design and develop experiences that make people's lives simpler through Web and Mobile apps. I work with FIgma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative and Flutter.

title: Привет, я Чарльз
description: Я разрабатываю пользовательские интерфейсы, упрощающие жизнь людей с помощью веб-приложений и мобильных приложений. Я работаю с FIgma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative и Flutter.

title: Salom, men Charlesman
description: Men odamlarning hayotini veb va mobil iloqalar orqali osonlashtiradigan tajribalarni loyihalashtiraman va ishlab chiqaman. FIgma, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, ReactNative va Flutter bilan ishlayman.
